thread.title: B Barber. Albany Georgia
thread.title_full: Street Smart Transmission reviewed by B Barber. Albany Georgia

author: B Barber. Albany Georgia
title: B Barber. Albany Georgia
text: By far the best experience I've ever had!! The customer service reps answered each question I had in timely response! Them shipping the new transmission was very fast! Everything went perfect with the installation and me shipping the core back to them was very easy!! I would definitely do business with them again!!
